About Me

I am pursuing my M.S. in Computer Science at SUNY Buffalo with a focus on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Beyond academics, I am deeply passionate about Mathematics and how it shapes the foundation of modern AI systems.

I love tackling real-world problems where technology can create meaningful impactâ€”whether through building efficient data pipelines, designing scalable ML models, or developing full-stack applications.

At my core, I am a tech-driven person who thrives on innovation, continuous learning, and solving complex challenges. My interests span deep learning, reinforcement learning, and optimization techniques that push the boundaries of what AI can achieve.
